Action.author: aambati
Action.body: ~smithbk enroll command requires user id and password as part of the URL. But the URL stored in the config file will not have the userid and password. so, either -u option or FABRIC_CA_CLIENT_URL env property must be specified for enroll command to work.

Action.author: smithbk
Action.body: You are correct that we do not store it in the config file, but the URL in the config file may have the user/pass if they manually put it there.

Action.author: vdods
Action.body: Is this slated for v1.0.x (I hope)?

Action.author: aambati
Action.body: ~vdods I was not thinking of backporting it 1.0.x. But if you need it in 1.0.x, i will.

Action.author: vdods
Action.body: I would most appreciate that, AnilKumar, thank you!

Action.author: smithbk
Action.body: This is already merged in alpha but this will remain open until it is backported to v1.
